import './App.css' import '../src/css/layout.css' import '../src/css/spacing.css' import Header from './components/Header' import Filter from './components/Filter' import Table from './components/Table' import Modal from './components/Modal' import Resume from './components/Resume' import TasksListProvider from '../src/contexts/TasksListContext' import useTasksList from '../src/hooks/useTasksList' function App() { const [showFiltro, setShowFiltro] = use const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) return ( {showModal && }
{showFiltro && } {} ) } export default App
